mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (is_active, last_login_at, name, email, profile_image_url, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{isActive}, #{lastLoginAt}, #{name}, #{email}, #{profileImageUrl}, now(), null)
mapper.select: SELECT id, is_active, last_login_at, name, email, profile_image_url, created_at, updated_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET is_active = #{isActive}, last_login_at = #{lastLoginAt}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, profile_image_url = #{profileImageUrl}, updated_at = now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE users SET is_active = false, updated_at = now() WHERE id = #{id}
